item.title: Kennels
item.description:
• MountainGarden Kennel Our kennel
  • American Staffordshire Terrier Club Holland TThe Dutch Breed Association
  • Staffiland's Kennel Our italian friend and Blade's breeder, Renato Brandolino
  • Stonewall'S Kennel Our friend Hans de Bruin's kennel
  • Ringerike Kennel The Staffordshire Bull Terrier kennel of our friend and handler Liesbeth Dusbaba
  • Parastone's Kennel Nala's breeder
  • Holywood Kennel Home of the stud we found for Nala
  • Playmaker's Kennel Some of the most passionate and sympathtic Amstaff lovers we have ever met, with great dogs

item.title: Food, health and training
item.description:
• Doglovers Gold The food we give our dogs
  • Bandit For variety we feed them Bandit organic raw meat meals
  • Care for Pets Our supplier for DogLovers Gold and Bandit in Almere
  • Martin Gaus dogschool Lelystad Where we did obedience training
